name: Performance Timing Test

screenshots.caption: Detail of Widget - Click on icon to active test to get speed test

short_description:
Measures the speed and timing performance in general in your network, your browser and the server of the pages of websites with this useful widget extension dedicated to your Firefox browser. You can immediately save the chart test result within your file system for a comparison with other subsequent tests.

== Installation ==
1. Click on download directly from your Firefox browser and install add-on
2. Then click on the icon of the extension included in toolbar to start test
summary: Get accurate performance timing for any page with this add-on Firefox
